JP

Turn Links into Buttons

Adds Kintone-like buttons to record detail pages from LINK/Text fields. Choose placement (Header/Space), button variants (primary/secondary/danger/outline/mini), optional confirmation, hide original field, and open in a new tab. Automatically follows the system language (JA/EN).

Features

Screenshots

How to use

1

Install the plugin

Add and enable the plugin in Kintone admin.

2

Add to app

Add the plugin to your target app.

3

Configure

Pick source fields, placement, and button variants, then save.

4

Verify

Buttons appear on the record detail header/space.

Limitations

  • No mobile support
  • Subtable fields not supported
  • Only http/https URLs
  • Pop-up blockers may prevent new tabs

FAQ

Mobile support?

PC only for now.

Subtable URLs?

Not supported. Use non-subtable fields.

Hide original field?

Enable “Hide field” in the settings.
